title: When is LB Skin Coming Out?
body: When is the new LB skin coming out?

replies.body: She comes out in 6.5. Unfortunately, we generally don't state a specific date.
Somewhere around the most recent patch ( patch 6.5 )
They release the blood skins the day of the patch and this one apparently takes days.

> [{quoted}](name=Hiemal,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EIWd3iQa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-09T15:00:32.599+0000)
>
> They release the blood skins the day of the patch and this one apparently takes days.

In most cases, the skins to be released on whatever designated patch usually take a few days, don't expect everything to be immediate.
I don't know why they released the blood moon skins upon the arrival of the patch ( if they actually did ), but don't always expect this to happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Axel The Lord,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EIWd3iQa,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-09T15:02:07.519+0000)
>
> In most cases, the skins to be released on whatever designated patch usually take a few days, don't expect everything to be immediate.
> I don't know why they released the blood moon skins upon the arrival of the patch ( if they actually did ), but don't always expect this to happen.

It will also say if they will be released later in the patch too. ( read patch notes )
